Brokeback Mountain

Rank: 71


Two shepherds fall for each other- but their relationship becomes complicated when they both get married to their respective girlfriends.


Director: Ang Lee

Writer: Annie Proulx, Larry McMurtry, Diana Ossana

Stars: Jake Gyllenhaal, Heath Ledger, Michelle Williams

Tags: Contemporary Western, Steamy Romance, Tragedy, Tragic Romance, Drama, Romance
